dcterms:description: A case study illustrating the workflow of a Research Scientist, focusing on optimizing the sequence of steps involved in daily research activities such as literature reviews and research publications using Q-Learning.
dcterms:title: Research Scientist Workflow

dcterms:description: A case study detailing the workflow for tracking legal matters, outlining the steps legal associates follow when managing a new legal request from a client through to completion, optimized using Q-Learning.
dcterms:title: Legal Matter Intake Workflow
